citation: American Heart Association. (2024). Guidelines for Management of High Blood Pressure in Adults. Hypertension. 2024;83:e1-e180.
content: For adults with stage 1 hypertension (130-139/80-89 mmHg), initial treatment should include lifestyle modifications such as dietary changes, regular physical activity, weight management, and stress reduction. Pharmacological treatment may be considered if lifestyle modifications are insufficient after 3-6 months.
